game.name: Surgical Strike
game.description:
Do you want to become a great warrior? Have you got bored with the traditional killing and shooting games? Join Surgical Strike game and get ready to enter the adventurous and realistic front-line military war game! This beautifully-designed action game puzzle will take you to an environment where you have to face a sudden terrorist attack. Here you will get a chance to play the role an experienced army military commando. It will be in your hands now how to protect your country form the brutal enemies. 
There is no need to bother about a massive terrorist attack. You will have a snipper rifle or gun to face the terrorist in this army battle simulator. Do not forget to use your aeroplane to release the bomb on the horde of terrorists when they increase in number suddenly! You are definitely the last hope for the people of your country. Try to be active all the time and put your bravest action skill to test to give a befitting reply to the heartless terrorist enemies in this best FPS shooting game!
Play this fps military war game wisely to take instant action against terrorism! You as a top military command been selected to accomplish this objective based mission. Your enemies are armed with the guns. Do not wait anymore! Jump right into the brilliantly designed action packed operation and see the world that you are a true military command hero! Use your mouse to shoot and defeat all your terrorist enemies in this free online war shooter game!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Surgical Strike at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: CLICK ON L ICON TO SELECT THE WEAPON, L CLICK ON ENEMIES TO KILLL
